values.title: Marthe TrolyCurtin
values.desc: Time you enjoy wasting is not wasted time

values.title: Anthony G Oettinger
values.desc: Time flies like an arrow, fruit flies like a banana

values.title: Roy T Bennett
values.desc: Don't waste your time in anger, regrets, worries and grudges. Life is too short to be unhappy

values.title: Antoine de SaintExupry
values.desc: It is the time you have wasted for your rose that makes your rose so important

values.title: Dave Eggers
values.desc: Books have a unique way of stopping time in a particular moment and saying Lets not forget this

values.title: Dr Seuss
values.desc: How did it get so late so soon?

values.title: Paulo Coelho
values.desc: Don't waste your time with explanations. people only hear what they want to hear

values.title: Mother Theresa
values.desc: Yesterday is gone, Tomorrow has not yet come. We have only today Let us begin

values.title: Oprah Winfrey
values.desc: You can have it all, Just not all at once

values.title: Coco Chanel
values.desc: Don't spend time beating on a wall hoping to transform it into a door

values.title: Roy T Bennett
values.desc: Time doesn't heal emotional, pain. you need to learn how to let go

values.title: Tennessee Williams
values.desc: Time is the longest distance between two places

values.title: Cassandra Clare
values.desc: They say time heals all wounds but that presumes the source of the grief is finite

values.title: Andy Warhol
values.desc: They always say time changes things but you actually have to change them yourself

values.title: Dr Seuss
values.desc: They say I'm old-fashioned and live in the past, but sometimes I think progress progresses too fast

values.title: Charles Darwin
values.desc: A man who dares to waste one hour of time has not discovered the value of life

values.title: Taylor Swift
values.desc: This is a new year A new beginning And things will change

values.title: Cormac McCarthy
values.desc: Scars have the strange power to remind us that our past is real

values.title: Haruki Murakami
values.desc: Unfortunately the clock is ticking, the hours are going by, The past increases the future recedes, Possibilities decreasing, regrets mounting

values.title: Kurt Vonnegut
values.desc: Here we are trapped in the amber of the moment There is no why

values.title: Lao Tzu
values.desc: Time is a created thing To say I don't have time is like saying I don't want to

values.title: Albert Einstein
values.desc: Time is an illusion
